00015 bool LAManager::analyze(const UString& inputString, TermList& rawTerms, TermList& primaryTerms, TermList& secondaryTerms){
00016 
00017         Tokenizer tokenizer;
00018         Analyzer* analyzer;
00019 
00020         tokenizer.setConfig(config.tokenConfig);
00021 
00022         tokenizer.tokenize(inputString, rawTerms, primaryTerms);
00023 
00024         secondaryTerms = primaryTerms;
00025 
00026         if(config.useNounFilter)
00027                 if(config.language == LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_ENGLISH)
00028                         enNounFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00029                 else if (config.language == LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_KOREAN)
00030                         krNounFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00031 
00032 
00033         if(config.useLengthFilter)
00034                 lenFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00035 
00036         if(config.useStopFilter)
00037                 stopFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00038 
00039         if(config.useStemAnalyzer){
00040                 if(config.language > LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_UNKNOWN && config.language < LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_EOS)
00041                         stemAnalyzer->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00042         }
00043 
00044         if(config.useNGramAnalyzer)
00045                 ngramAnalyzer->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00046 
00047         return true;
00048 }
00049 bool LAManager::analyze(const UString& inputString, TermList& secondaryTerms){

00052         Analyzer* analyzer;

00055

00059                 if(config.language == LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_ENGLISH)
00060                         enNounFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00061                 else if (config.language == LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_KOREAN)
00062                         krNounFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00063 
00064         if(config.useLengthFilter)
00065                 lenFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00066 
00067         if(config.useStopFilter)
00068                 stopFilter->analyze(secondaryTerms);
00069 
00070         if(config.useStemAnalyzer){

00073         }
